This is an [R Markdown](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com) Notebook. When you execute code within the notebook, the results appear beneath the code. 

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
ar_properties = read.csv('ar_properties.csv')
```

```{r}
glimpse(ar_properties)
```

```{r}
table(ar_properties$l1)
```
```{r}
table(ar_properties$l2)
```


```{r}
table(ar_properties$currency)
```
```{r}
table(ar_properties$property_type)
```
```{r}
table(ar_properties$operation_type)
```


```{r}
ar_properties = ar_properties %>%
  filter(l1 == "Argentina",
         l2 == "Capital Federal",
         currency == "USD",
         property_type == "Casa" |
           property_type == "Departamento" | 
           property_type == "PH",
         operation_type == "Venta")
```

```{r}
ar_properties = ar_properties %>%
  select(c("id", "l3", "rooms", "bedrooms", "bathrooms", "surface_total", 
           "surface_covered", "price", "property_type"))
```

```{r}
glimpse(ar_properties)
```
